databaseConfig.sql: select MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU_ID , MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.PORTAL_INFO_SYUBETU_NAME , MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.DELETE_FLAG , MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.SEND_FLAG , MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.VESSEL_ID , MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.DATA_NO , MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.USER_KEY , MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.RENEW_DATE , MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.TS from MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU where (MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.DELETE_FLAG = 0 or MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU.DELETE_FLAG is NULL)

INSERT INTO MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU ( MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU_ID , PORTAL_INFO_SYUBETU_NAME , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU_ID , :PORTAL_INFO_SYUBETU_NAME , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU SET PORTAL_INFO_SYUBETU_NAME = :PORTAL_INFO_SYUBETU_NAME , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU_ID = :MS_PORTAL_INFO_SHUBETU_ID
